sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , F.GIS_ASSETS_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ , F.PRT_FCLTY_NM , F.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD , F.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT , F.PRT_FCLTY_SE , F.PRT_FCLTY_GIS_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_CD || '-' || F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AS GIS_ASSETS_DISPLAY_CD , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD ||'-'|| F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_DISPLAY_CD , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NAME , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT , F.LA_CRDNT , F.LO_CRDNT , F.LAT , F.LNG , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM059', F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD) PRT_FCLTY_SE_NM , F.FCLTS_MNG_NO , A.GIS_ASSETS_NM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , A.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , A.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM002', A.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LOC_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F F, GIS_ASSETS_CD_F A, INFO_COMM_FCLTY_SPEC_F I WHERE F.GIS_ASSETS_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = I.FCLTS_MNG_NO AND F.PRT_FCLTY_SE = 'I'
AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #sPrtFcltyCd#
AND F.PRT_FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #sPrtFcltyNm# || '%'
AND I.LOC LIKE '%' || #sLoc# || '%'
ORDER BY F.GIS_ASSETS_CD DESC , F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE DESC , F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD DESC , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD DESC , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ DESC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F F, GIS_ASSETS_CD_F A, INFO_COMM_FCLTY_SPEC_F I WHERE F.GIS_ASSETS_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = I.FCLTS_MNG_NO AND F.PRT_FCLTY_SE = 'I'
AND F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #sPrtFcltyCd#
AND F.PRT_FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #sPrtFcltyNm# || '%'
AND I.LOC LIKE '%' || #sLoc# || '%'

SELECT F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NAME , F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE2 , F.GIS_ASSETS_CD , F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_NM FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_NM , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_LNM FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LNM , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , (SELECT GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = F.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = F.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD , F.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ , F.PRT_FCLTY_SE , F.PRT_FCLTY_NM , F.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD , F.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT , TO_CHAR(F.PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT , TO_CHAR(F.LA_CRDNT) LA_CRDNT , TO_CHAR(F.LO_CRDNT) LO_CRDNT , F.PRT_FCLTY_GIS_CD , F.FCLTS_MNG_NO , F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , (SELECT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = F.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO_NM , I.LOC , I.STNDRD , I.INSTL_SE , I.INSTL_NO , I.FUNC , I.CTRL_MTHD , I.INSTL_STNDRD , TO_CHAR(I.INSTL_HT) INSTL_HT , I.LAMP_FMT , I.INFO_COMM_FCLTS_CL_CD , (SELECT FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM FCLTS_CL_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_CL_CD = I.INFO_COMM_FCLTS_CL_CD) INFO_COMM_FCLTS_CL_CD_NM , I.ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO , (SELECT PRT_FCLTY_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = I.ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO) ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO_NM , I.PRDLST_NM , I.MODEL , I.PTLR_DTLS , TO_CHAR(I.QY) QY , I.MAKER , I.RM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F F INNER JOIN INFO_COMM_FCLTY_SPEC_F I ON F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = I.FCLTS_MNG_NO WHERE F.FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO INFO_COMM_FCLTY_SPEC_F ( FCLTS_MNG_NO , LOC , STNDRD , INSTL_SE , INSTL_NO , FUNC , CTRL_MTHD , INSTL_STNDRD , INSTL_HT , LAMP_FMT , INFO_COMM_FCLTS_CL_CD , ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO , PRDLST_NM , MODEL , PTLR_DTLS , QY , MAKER , RM , REG_USR , REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# || #gisAssetsCd# || #gisAssetsSubCd# || #gisPrtFcltyCd# || #gisPrtFcltySeq# || #prtFcltySe# , #loc# , #stndrd# , #instlSe# , #instlNo# , #func# , #ctrlMthd# , #instlStndrd# , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#instlHt#, ',', '')) , #lampFmt# , #infoCommFcltsClCd# , #archFcltsMngNo# , #prdlstNm# , #model# , #ptlrDtls# , TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#qy#, ',', '')) , #maker# , #rm# , #regUsr# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE INFO_COMM_FCLTY_SPEC_F SET LOC = #loc# , STNDRD = #stndrd# , INSTL_SE = #instlSe# , INSTL_NO = #instlNo# , FUNC = #func# , CTRL_MTHD = #ctrlMthd# , INSTL_STNDRD = #instlStndrd# , INSTL_HT = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#instlHt#, ',', '')) , LAMP_FMT = #lampFmt# , INFO_COMM_FCLTS_CL_CD = #infoCommFcltsClCd# , ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO = #archFcltsMngNo# , PRDLST_NM = #prdlstNm# , MODEL = #model# , PTLR_DTLS = #ptlrDtls# , QY = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#qy#, ',', '')) , MAKER = #maker# , RM = #rm# , UPD_USR = #updUsr# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT FCLTS_MNG_NO , ATCH_FILE_SEQ , ATCH_FILE_SE , GAM_GET_FILE_SE_NM(ATCH_FILE_SE) ATCH_FILE_SE_NM , ATCH_FILE_SJ , ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC , ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL , TO_CHAR(ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #sFcltsMngNo# ORDER BY ATCH_FILE_SEQ ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #sFcltsMngNo#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(ATCH_FILE_SEQ),0) + 1) FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#
INSERT INTO FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F ( FCLTS_MNG_NO , ATCH_FILE_SEQ , ATCH_FILE_SE , ATCH_FILE_SJ , ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC , ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL , ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT , REG_USR , REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #fcltsMngNo# , TO_NUMBER(#maxAtchFileSeq#) , #atchFileSe# , #atchFileSj# , #atchFileNmLogic# , #atchFileNmPhysicl# , TO_DATE(#atchFileWritngDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , #regUsr# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F SET ATCH_FILE_SE = #atchFileSe# , ATCH_FILE_SJ = #atchFileSj# , ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC = #atchFileNmLogic# , ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL = #atchFileNmPhysicl# , ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT = TO_DATE(#atchFileWritngDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , UPD_USR = #updUsr# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo# AND ATCH_FILE_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#atchFileSeq#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo# AND ATCH_FILE_SEQ = TO_NUMBER(#atchFileSeq#)
